column4: can someone help me? for the past few days i have been trying to configure my internet connection with Ubuntu. Its not happening at all.
how do you connect? wired or wireless?
wired
how do you connect? Dialup, Ethernet, DSL?
first thing, is your network card detected?
yes it is detected
does it show up in system > administration > networking ?
yes
why can't you configure it from there?
i did all the config settings
then what's the issue?
are you giving it the right settings?
Yes, I am using the same settings in windows
how is your ip address assigned?
okay, what are the settings?
is it okay if I pm you?
you need to be identified to send private messages.
uh oh. how do i do that
/j #fyre-helps
how are you doing?
I couldnt get that working last night :(
sorry to hear that :(
